[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@svelte-put/movable](./movable.md) &gt; [MovableEventDetails](./movable.movableeventdetails.md)

## MovableEventDetails interface

`detail` payload for `movableend` and `movablestart` [CustomEvent](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CustomEvent)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface MovableEventDetails 
```

## Example


```html
<script>
 function handler(event) {
   const { position, node } = event.detail;
   console.log('action movable was used on element', node);
   console.log('last known position:', position);
}
</script>

<div
 use:movable
 on:movablestart={handler}
 on:movableend={handler}
/>
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [node](./movable.movableeventdetails.node.md) |  | HTMLElement | the node that the action was placed on |
|  [position](./movable.movableeventdetails.position.md) |  | { left: number; top: number; } | last known position, as in styles.position |
